resources.name: Health Check
resources.description: System health check - validates API, Database, and Redis connectivity

resources.name: GraphQL Playground
resources.description: Interactive GraphQL playground for testing queries

resources.name: Register User
resources.description: Register a new user account. Returns user data and authentication tokens.

resources.name: Login User
resources.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT tokens (24h access, 7d refresh).

resources.name: Get Current User (Me)
resources.description: Get currently authenticated user details. Requires valid JWT token.

resources.name: Get All Stores
resources.description: Get all stores with pagination and filtering. Validated: No 'description' field.

resources.name: Get Store by ID
resources.description: Get a single store by ID

resources.name: Get Store by Code
resources.description: Get store by unique code (e.g., 'iki', 'maxima', 'lidl')

resources.name: Get Current Flyers
resources.description: Get currently valid flyers across all stores or filtered by store IDs

resources.name: Get Flyer Details with Products
resources.description: Get complete flyer details including nested products

resources.name: Get Products with Pagination
resources.description: Get products with filters and pagination. Validated: use 'imageURL' not 'thumbnailURL'.

resources.name: Get Product by ID (Full Details)

body.text:
{
  "query": "query GetProduct($id: Int!) {
    product(id: $id) {
      id
      sku
      slug
      name
      normalizedName
      brand
      category
      subcategory
      description
      price {
        current
        original
        currency
        discount
        discountPercent
        discountAmount
        isDiscounted
      }
      unitSize
      unitType
      unitPrice
      packageSize
      weight
      volume
      imageURL
      isOnSale
      isCurrentlyOnSale
      validFrom
      validTo
      saleStartDate
      saleEndDate
      isValid
      isExpired
      validityPeriod
      extractionConfidence
      extractionMethod
      requiresReview
      store {
        id
        code
        name
        logoURL
      }
      flyer {
        id
        title
        validFrom
        validTo
        isCurrent
      }
      flyerPage {
        id
        pageNumber
        imageURL
      }
      productMaster {
        id
        canonicalName
        brand
        category
      }
    }
  }",
  "variables": {
    "id": 1
  }
}

resources.description: Get complete product details including all relations. Validated: ProductMaster.canonicalName not .name

resources.name: Products on Sale
resources.description: Get currently discounted products with optional price range and category filters

resources.name: Simple Search
resources.description: Simple product search with Lithuanian support. Validated: Full-text search working.

resources.name: Advanced Search with Filters
resources.description: Advanced search with filters, facets, and pagination. Validated: FacetOption.name not .label

resources.name: Fuzzy Search
resources.description: Fuzzy search for typo tolerance (e.g., 'piens' finds 'pienas')

resources.name: Get Price History
resources.description: Get price history for a product master. Validated: Returns records ordered by recordedAt DESC.

resources.name: Get Current Price
resources.description: Get most recent price for a product at a specific store. Validated: Returns latest entry.

resources.name: Price History with Date Range
resources.description: Get price history within a specific date range. Validated: Filter dates working.

resources.name: Get All Shopping Lists
resources.description: Get all shopping lists for authenticated user. Validated: Computed fields working correctly.

resources.name: Get Shopping List by ID
resources.description: Get shopping list with all items

resources.name: Get Default Shopping List
resources.description: Get user's default shopping list. Validated: First list auto-becomes default.

resources.name: Create Shopping List
resources.description: Create a new shopping list. Validated: First list auto-becomes default regardless of input.

resources.name: Update Shopping List
resources.description: Update shopping list name and description

resources.name: Delete Shopping List
resources.description: Delete a shopping list. Returns boolean success indicator.

resources.name: Set Default Shopping List
resources.description: Set a shopping list as the default. Unsets other defaults automatically.

resources.name: Get Product Master by ID

body.text:
{
  "query": "query GetProductMaster($id: Int!) {
    productMaster(id: $id) {
      id
      canonicalName
      normalizedName
      brand
      category
      subcategory
      standardUnitSize
      standardUnitType
      standardPackageSize
      standardWeight
      standardVolume
      matchingKeywords
      alternativeNames
      exclusionKeywords
      confidenceScore
      matchedProducts
      successfulMatches
      failedMatches
      matchSuccessRate
      status
      isVerified
      lastMatchedAt
      verifiedAt
      verifiedBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt
    }
  }",
  "variables": {
    "id": 1
  }
}

resources.description: Get product master (canonical product definition) by ID. Validated: Use canonicalName not name.

resources.name: Get Product Masters with Filters
resources.description: Get product masters with filtering and pagination. Updated: Removed isVerified filter (not in DB)
